title: Advanced Steeltoe Workshop Workshop
content:
Pivotal Platform Architecture helps companies learn how to solve IT and engineering challenges. We encourage you to explore our workshops. Build the future with Pivotal!  Advanced Steeltoe Workshop Workshop
  Workshop Conceptos deck Workshop Población 1. Overview 2. Basic Push 3. Database 4. Service Discovery 5. Config Server 6. Hystrix 7. Actuators, Tracing & Metrics 8. Security

title: Conceptos
content: Conceptos Aprenda lo básico, comprenda las arquitecturas y complete los conceptos básicos detrás del taller.

title: Población
content: Población Construye arquitecturas y prueba los conceptos centrales detrás del taller.
